name: VR Sand
description: VR Sand is a 3D falling sand toy made for VR. Place various elements with your controllers and experiment with their reactions.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Processor: AMD 290, Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Processor: AMD 290, Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 60 MB available space
